definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_tree_spruce"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="base_height">6</field><field name="height_variation_a">2</field><field name="height_variation_b">1</field><field name="force_dirt">FALSE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><value name="dirt"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.DIRT#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed under the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.LOG#1</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.LEAVES#1</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the leaves</comment></block></value><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">2</field><field name="max">4</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This represents the maximum radius of the foliage. Note that high values might cause leaves to decay</comment></block></value><value name="trunk_height"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">1</field><field name="max">3</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This determines how many blocks of the trunk will remain exposed, starting from the bottom of the tree</comment></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Spruce trees don't have roots</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">2</field><next><block type="placement_in_square"><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
